replies.author: xmdhs

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
server.properties文件中加上一行server-ip=
就可以了

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content: 其他子服务器的spigot.yml里面设置bungeecord: true
